title: Manufacturing Jobs
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

The 2012 presidential candidates have all stressed the need to bring manufacturing jobs “back” to the United States from overseas. While it’s true that the United States has lost more than five million manufacturing jobs in the past decade due to foreign competition and productivity gains, there are also a lot of manufacturing jobs still here in America – and many of those jobs are going unfilled.

"},{"content":"
","type":"text/html"}]
contentencoded: The 2012 presidential candidates have all stressed the need to bring manufacturing jobs “back” to the United States from overseas. While it’s true that the United States has lost more than five million manufacturing jobs in the past decade due to foreign competition and productivity gains, there are also a lot of manufacturing jobs still here in America – and many of those jobs are going unfilled.
